problem: An arrow with a mass of 85 grams is launched from a bow. The bowstring applies an average force of 105 N to the arrow over a distance of 75 cm. Determine the speed of the arrow as it leaves the bow.

correctFormulas.name: Work–energy theorem
correctFormulas.formula: W = F₍avg₎ d = ½ m v²

steps.explanation: Compute the work done by the string.
Set the work equal to the kinetic energy and solve for v.
